plot: "The Morning Guy" is a comedy about just how long a wife can put up with her husband's unique way of expressing himself.
title: The Morning Guy
plot_es: "The Morning Guy" is a comedy about just how long a wife can put up with her husband's unique way of expressing himself.
plot_en: "The Morning Guy" is a comedy about just how long a wife can put up with her husband's unique way of expressing himself.
